subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Carey Price got his second shutout and Andrei Kostitsyn scored twice Monday night to lead the Montreal Canadiens to a victory against the Boston Bruins in Game 7 of their first-round series.
snippet: Carey Price got his second shutout and Andrei Kostitsyn scored twice Monday night to lead the Montreal Canadiens to a victory against the Boston Bruins in Game 7 of their first-round series.
